title: Every-time i hit 35-37 min in a game i freeze for 5 sec ( why? )
body:
Sooo

Yeah this has been happening for a couple of months now and i don't know why
I just freeze for 5 sec and then everything works again but i don't know why this is happening tho

replies.body: Does your entire PC freeze, or is it only certain elements in-game, such as champions, minions, health bars, etc? Are there any error messages or anything else that occurs when the freeze is actively going on?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=K6uGKdwe,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-03T04:50:10.860+0000)
>
> Does your entire PC freeze, or is it only certain elements in-game, such as champions, minions, health bars, etc? Are there any error messages or anything else that occurs when the freeze is actively going on?

When i reach 35-37 min time in any league game THE GAME freeze's for 5seconds and then it works normally again but before or after that time it works perfectly ( as perfectly as league can work )

And no its not my pc everything else works 
Been playing
Far cry primal
Assassin's creed syndicate
Doom

For 4-6 hours straight and nothing like that ever happened so am assuming is your game that has the problem same with the match history website that i posted on my other thread and a Rioter thought it was my problem but when i send a support ticket to your technical stuff they said this
http://i.imgur.com/1GbI5hP.png

So am 99% sure this is your problem too Riot

Please fix your game Riot

While the Match History Page is an issue that we're aware of and are looking to fix, I've seen no other reports of your specific symptoms, so I think it's fair to assume this is caused by something local to your PC. A lot of freezes or system lock-ups are caused by a bad driver or hardware interaction. I strongly suggest working through the steps inside [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address the most common solutions for these symptoms.

If you continue to encounter this issue in-game after taking those steps, please let me know.
